name: cc-skills
description: Curated collection of production-grade skills for Claude Code, including enterprise .NET development standards, patterns, and templates

plugins.name: dotnet-coding-standards
plugins.description: .NET coding standards and patterns for enterprise development. Covers Clean Architecture, Serilog logging, Sentry error tracking, StyleCop compliance, unit testing with 80%+ coverage, async/await patterns, and CI/CD configuration. Includes 16 technical standards, 5 project type guides, checklists, templates, and IDE snippets.
